text: Andrew Hamilton (18 December 1873– 20 March 1939)http://watfordfcarchive.com/downloads/players/+Grieve-Harrison.pdf was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1873 births Category:1939 deaths Category:People from Falkirk Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Cambuslang F.C. players Category:Falkirk F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:New Brighton Tower F.C. players Category:Warmley F.C. players Category:Ryde Sports F.C. players Category:Watford F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Andrew Hamilton (footballer, born 1873)
